Photo: Twitter: @BroadCity What three words can best sum up the kinetic, chaotic lifestyle of two female stoners just getting by in New York City? Obviously the answer is Steven Vincent Buscemi. Broad City p osted an on-set photo of the Brooklyn-born, apparently social media-free actor hanging out with Abbi and Ilana during shooting. There‚Äôs obviously no way to tell what role the Horace and Pete star will play in the show‚Äôs upcoming fourth season, so we‚Äôre going to go with, let‚Äôs see, Abbi‚Äôs adorable baby cousin .
